mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS productId, CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, PRODUCT_NAME AS name, BRAND_NAME AS brandName, PRICE AS price, STOCK_QUANTITY AS stockQuantity, DESCRIPTION AS description, STATUS AS status, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, PRICE, STOCK_QUANTITY, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, IMAGE_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{categoryId}, #{name}, #{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price}, #{stockQuantity}, #{description, jdbcType=CLOB}, 'SALE', #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_IMAGE ( IMAGE_ID, PRODUCT_ID, IMAGE_URL, IS_MAIN ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{imageUrl}, #{isMain} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{name}, BRAND_NAME = #{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price}, STOCK_QUANTITY = #{stockQuantity}, DESCRIPTION = #{description, jdbcType=CLOB}, IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
